plot: Based upon a series of children's books, a young, six year old grizzly bear cub has many misadventures with his friends.
plot_en: Based upon a series of children's books, a young, six year old grizzly bear cub has many misadventures with his friends.
plot_es: Based upon a series of children's books, a young, six year old grizzly bear cub has many misadventures with his friends.
title: Little Bear
